channel.title: MELPA on Panda的随笔
channel.description: Recent content in MELPA on Panda的随笔

item.title: MELPA配置
item.description: MELPA (Milkypostman’s Emacs Lisp Package Archive) is an ELPA-compatible package repository that contains an enormous number of useful Emacs packages. In contrast to ELPA, Emacs is not configured by default to install packages from MELPA. You will have to configure Emacs to use it. 一、Get started To add MELPA to your package-archives,
